comments:
This introduction to the modern mechanical design process is a project based course. It covers product definition, computer-aided design, fundamental design practices, computer simulation and analysis and prototyping.

Students raved about the skills learned in this course and its usefulness for engineering majors.

Students found Professor Fiene an “engaging lecturer” who shows a lot of interest in his students despite the fact that he has so many.

This course has no tests and is entirely project-based. However, students warned not to “underestimate the amount of work you have to do for this class.”
